skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Everyone began their career from an engaged place. One day we were enthusiastic and committed to doing something meaningful in our role. However, over time the daily frustrations, menial tasks, and overwhelming sense of futility takes it's toll. We begin to feel stuck, complacent, or that our work has little meaning. 

This show is to inspire people to remember why they were excited about their work in the first place. We are going to provide you with tools to re-engage in your work, care about what you do, and find meaning in the role you have. We want to teach you how to destroy workplace toxicity, overcome complacency, and derive meaning, purpose, and fulfillment in your work.

Why should people care if they are engaged at work?

Well, businesses with engaged employees are on average 22% more profitable. Disengaged employees cost US companies over $450 billion every year!

Employees that are engaged earn on average 23% more than their colleagues. 

People that are happy have been show to be 19% more accurate and 31% more productive. 

Everyone deserves to love the work they do. 

We are on a mission to give everyone the tools to be engaged in their work and have fun while they are doing it.
